item.title: Docker Seq Setup With API Token
item.description: Here’s what happened I was playing around with a system that my team was building at work. The system, when deployed, will have 3 components living on 3 different servers with their networks locked down. You can think of it like: a — b — c Server a can talk to server b, b to a and c, and c to b. To test these without deploying to the actual environment, I figured I may as well dockerize it!
